ygData.subject: Re: Max Damage?
ygData.msgSnippet: The strength bonus does not kick in until after 20th level.  A weakling mage if he could use the same weapons as you, would hit as hard as you until said 20th
ygData.messageBody:
The strength bonus does not kick in until after 20th level. A weakling mage
if he could use the same weapons as you, would hit as hard as you until said
20th level.

I am now hitting in the vicinity of 50 points of damage as a 31st level Barb
warrior with 120str weilding a BBC. I dont know why its that high
sometimes, other times i hit for 2 or 3 points. Just the way the rolls go i
gues..

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule
